title: Asael's Nature
description: Can you change your nature?When the fallen angel Asael returns to earth, he slips back into his old ways as the angel of punishment by performing in night clubs until he gets an interesting new client - a demon who enjoys his punishment shows. Is this just who he's become now? Isda, a young healer, gets dragged into the ongoing war for her research into a new drug and attracts the attention of demons. When Asael is assigned to protect her the relationship begins to bloom, but her feelings are at odds with everything she has been told. Can she compete with the demon that shares a passion of his?There's more to the demon, Audrey, than meets the eye, but what is her role in the war against evil? Will the other angels of Los Angeles tolerate the Angel of Punishment in their midst?
author: Joel Crofoot
